name: Bonelord (Artur Nista, Carlos A. Zgierski)
description:
Something strange is happening to your village.

The undead has risen from their grave and are attacking everyone.

Explore and find the Evil source and destroy it!

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD: Move
  • 1: Spell 1
  • 2: Spell 2
  • F: Potions
  • Tab or Q: Next Target
  • E: Previous Target
  • ESC: Menu/Inventory

Created by Artur Nista and Carlos Zgierski for Retrograde Jam 3
